name: Datadog Logs コンテキスト 最小
description: logger.setContext で共通フィールドを追加

files.template:
<!doctype html>
<html><body><script src='https://www.datadoghq-browser-agent.com/datadog-logs.js'></script><script>window.DD_LOGS && DD_LOGS.init({ clientToken:'token', site:'datadoghq.com' }); DD_LOGS && DD_LOGS.setLoggerGlobalContext({ env:'dev' }); DD_LOGS && DD_LOGS.logger.info('hello');</script></body></html>
